en.name: Leonid Zhavoronkov
en.summary: Infrastructure & DevOps Engineer with more than 10 years of experience in designing, automating, and operating scalable systems. Strong background in Linux, containers, CI/CD pipelines, and distributed services. I focus on reliability, automation, and long-term maintainability rather than quick hacks. I enjoy turning fragile setups into predictable, well-documented infrastructure.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Mathematics and Informatics

experience.title: Platform Engineer - Autohaus Royal GmbH
highlights: Migrated production infrastructure from VMware to Proxmox, improving flexibility and reducing dependency on proprietary tooling.
Automated provisioning of clustered platforms (Docker Swarm, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Redis, ELK) using Ansible.
Implemented HA deployments and automated upgrades for n8n and HAProxy.
Designed and operated Proxmox infrastructure using Terraform (IaC) for automated VM provisioning and lifecycle management.
Designed and deployed a centralized GlusterFS storage cluster integrated with Docker Swarm and Samba.
Built ~40 reusable Ansible roles, significantly reducing manual provisioning effort.
Implemented centralized monitoring with Zabbix, including automated agent rollout and service discovery.

experience.title: DevOps Engineer - TulaCo
highlights: Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines in Jenkins for 10+ projects.
Integrated SonarQube into Jenkins pipelines for automated code quality checks.
Migrated multiple Linux servers to newer OS versions, including application and database upgrades.
Managed AWS infrastructure (EC2, S3), including backups and basic scaling.
Implemented monitoring and alerting using Micro Focus SiteScope.

experience.title: System Administrator - IT-Lab LLC
highlights: Operated and maintained VMware and Hyper-V clusters supporting core Windows services (AD, DNS, RDS).
Administered Linux servers (CentOS, Ubuntu) and on-prem IT infrastructure, including LAN/Wi-Fi networks, firewalls, switches, and routers.
Implemented 24/7 monitoring with Zabbix across servers and network devices.
Managed backups and disaster recovery processes, including multi-storage and S3-based backups.
Supported and scaled IT infrastructure for multiple companies and distributed offices.

ui.page_description: Platform / DevOps Engineer portfolio focused on infrastructure automation and high availability.

de.name: Leonid Zhavoronkov

Ich habe Freude daran, fragile Setups in vorhersehbare, gut dokumentierte Infrastrukturen zu verwandeln.
